content.query:
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 01: Procedimiento almacenado - Template
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE PROCEDURE load_business_report_if_noload
    @table_name NVARCHAR(40),
    @year NVARCHAR(4),
    @month NVARCHAR(2),
    @result NVARCHAR(MAX) OUTPUT
AS BEGIN
    BEGIN TRY 
        IF NULLIF(@year, '') IS NULL
        BEGIN
        -- Generate divide-by-zero error.  
            ;THROW 51007, 'Parameter not defined.', 1
        END
        SET @result = 'Not Problem'
    END TRY  
    BEGIN CATCH  
        -- Execute error retrieval routine.  
        SET @result = (SELECT  ERROR_MESSAGE() AS ErrorMessage)
    END CATCH;
    SELECT @result AS resultado
END
GO

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 02: Prueba de procedimiento almacenado
-----------------------------------------------
DECLARE @OutputParameter  NVARCHAR(MAX)
       ,@ReturnValue      INT

EXEC @ReturnValue=load_business_report_if_noload 1,null, null, @OutputParameter OUTPUT
PRINT @OutputParameter

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 03: Transformaci√≥n de datos
-----------------------------------------------

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business.DimProduct
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/business/lakehouse/dimproduct/Year=2022/Month=04/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )  
 AS
SELECT p.ProductID AS ProductID, 
p.Name AS ProductName, 
p.ProductNumber AS ProductAlternativeKey, 
p.FinishedGoodsFlag AS FinishedGoodsFlag, 
p.Color AS Color,
p.SafetyStockLevel AS SafetyStockLevel,
p.ReorderPoint AS ReorderPoint,
p.StandardCost AS StandardCost,
p.ListPrice AS ListPrice,
p.Size AS Size,
p.ProductLine AS ProductLine,
p.Class AS Class,
p.Style AS Style,
p.SellStartDate AS SellStartDate,
p.SellEndDate AS SellEndDate,
p.DiscontinuedDate AS DiscontinuedDate,
pc.ProductCategoryName AS ProductCategoryName,
psc.Name AS ProductSubCategoryName
FROM stagingDim.Product p  
INNER JOIN stagingDim.ProductSubcategory psc
ON p.ProductSubCategoryID = psc.ProductSubCategoryID
INNER JOIN stagingDim.ProductCategory pc
ON pc.ProductCategoryID = psc.ProductCategoryID
GO
